Raft Wars 2 is an action-packed and entertaining game available as a Chrome extension. Join Simon and his brother on another thrilling adventure as they defend their treasure against relentless enemies. Equipped with a trusty raft and an arsenal of playful weapons, you'll engage in epic battles across various challenging levels. Strategically aim and shoot projectiles at opponents, utilizing ricochets and obstacles to your advantage. Each successful shot brings you closer to victory and protecting your precious loot. 
With its engaging storyline, vibrant graphics, and addictive gameplay, Raft Wars 2 offers hours of fun and excitement. Upgrade your weapons, unlock new levels, and face increasingly formidable foes. Whether you're a fan of the original Raft Wars or new to the series, Raft Wars 2 on Chrome Extension is a thrilling and action-packed gaming experience. Prepare for intense battles and embark on an unforgettable treasure-hunting journey.
